name: Prop
description: A Prop represents a Dynamic Mesh which can be spawned in the world, can be grabbed around by characters and have physics.

functions.name: SetGrabbable
functions.description: Sets ability to Characters to Grab this Prop

parameters.name: is_grabbable
parameters.description: If the Prop will be able to be grabbable or not

functions.name: SetPhysicsDamping
functions.description: Sets the Physics damping of this Prop

functions.name: GetHandler
functions.description: Gets the Character (if existing) which is holding this

return.description: the character that holds the object

functions.name: IsGrabbable
functions.description: Gets ability to Grab this Prop

events.name: Grab
events.description: Triggered when Character grabs a Prop

events.name: Hit
events.description: Triggered when this Prop hits something

arguments.name: self
arguments.description: The prop which has been hit

arguments.name: impact_force
arguments.description: The intensity of the Hit normalized by the Prop's weight

arguments.name: impact_location
arguments.description: The world 3D location of the impact

arguments.name: velocity
arguments.description: The Prop velocity at the moment it hits

events.name: Interact
events.description: When a Character interacts with this Prop (i.e. try to Grab it). Return false to prevent it

arguments.name: self
arguments.description: the object that undergoes an interaction

arguments.name: character
arguments.description: the character who interacts with the object

arguments.name: self
arguments.description: the object that takes the damage

arguments.name: from_direction
arguments.description: Direction of the damage relative to the damaged actor

arguments.name: instigator
arguments.description: The player which caused the damage

arguments.name: causer
arguments.description: The object which caused the damage

events.name: UnGrab
events.description: Triggered when this Prop hits something

arguments.name: self
arguments.description: The prop which has been ungrabbed
